Lilly Makes Stuff

On The Run - Music

Tell Me Anything - On The Run Theatre

2016

I worked with On the Run Theatre during their residencies at Shoreditch Town Hall and Camden People’s Theatre to help devise live soundtrack to their 2016 show Tell Me Anything. This including improvising live in rehearsals and scratch performances, playing different live electronics and acoustic instruments.
